name: SolarBlack
abstract: SolarBlack is an action-rhythm game made exclusively for VR where you slice and shoot to the beat to defeat an other-worldly threat.

detail.app_languages: Portuguese, Korean, Italian, French, Spanish, German, Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
Feel the Rhythm of Solar Black in our latest update: Cybersymphony!
Start your journey with 3 NEW levels, and 2 NEW songs:

NEW LEVELS
* Cyberpunk City, 2067: Experience technology & dystopian visuals colliding in our Cyberpunk City level.
* Crystal Falls: Discover the beauty of the breathtaking landscapes of South Africa, where nature meets tranquility.
* Letho: Explore the fiery depths of a new volcanic level that promises an adventure like no other.

NEW SONGS
* Vivaldi - Winter: Let the chilling melodies accompany you through your journey.
* Strauss - Also Sprach Zarathustra: You'll recognise this piece as a popular choice in Sci-Fi media. Embark on an epic adventure with the powerful notes of Strauss.

We're also giving you some optimizations:
* Post-Processing Improvements for a visually richer environment with enhanced post-processing, including bloom!
* Enjoy refined visuals across all platforms with shader optimizations ensuring a more immersive experience.

Play now!
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
